name: All-Season Tire
description: Perfect for year-round driving, offering a balance of performance and longevity.
performance: Provides great grip and handling in both wet and dry conditions.

name: Winter Tire
description: Designed for cold, icy conditions, providing maximum grip during the winter months.
performance: Outstanding traction on snow and ice, designed for optimal winter performance.

name: Summer Tire
description: High-performance tire for sporty vehicles, offering enhanced handling and speed.
performance: Excellent handling on dry and wet roads with a focus on high-speed stability.
